## 

### 

 - $z=a+b i(a, b \in R)$

 - $Z(a, b)$$\overrightarrow{OZ}$

 - $z=r(\cos \theta+i \sin \theta), r \geq 0$

 - $z=r e^{i \theta}$

---
### 



$$(a+b i) \pm(c+d i)=(a \pm c)+(b \pm d) i$$



$$(a+b i)(c+d i)=(a c-b d)+(b c+a d) i$$

$$r_{1}\left(\cos \theta_{1}+i \sin \theta_{1}\right) \cdot r_{2}\left(\cos \theta_{2}+i \sin \theta_{2}\right)=r_{1} r_{2}\left[\cos \left(\theta_{1}+\theta_{2}\right)+i \sin \left(\theta_{1}+\theta_{2}\right)\right]$$



$$\frac{a+b i}{c+b i}=\frac{a c+b d}{c^{2}+d^{2}}+\frac{b c-a d}{c^{2}+d^{2}} i(c+d i \neq 0)$$

$$\frac{r_{1}\left(\cos \theta_{1}+i \sin \theta_{1}\right)}{r_{2}\left(\cos \theta_{2}+i \sin \theta_{2}\right)}=\frac{r_1}{r_2}[\cos \left(\theta_{1}-\theta_{2}\right)+i \sin \left(\theta_{1}-\theta_{2}\right)]$$



$$[r(\cos \theta+i \sin \theta)]^{n}=r^{n}(\cos n \theta+i \sin n \theta)(n \in \mathbf{N})$$

$r(\cos \theta+i \sin \theta)$$n$

$$\sqrt[n]{r}\left(\cos \frac{\theta+2 k \pi}{n}+i \sin \frac{\theta+2 k \pi}{n}\right)(k-0,1,\dots, n-1)$$

---
###  - 

> $z^n-1=0(z\in\mathbb C)$

$z$. 

$1$$0$$z_0=1$

$2\pi$$z_1=\cos\frac{2\pi}{n}+i\sin\frac{2\pi}{n}$

$4\pi$$z_2=\cos\frac{4\pi}{n}+i\sin\frac{4\pi}{n}$

$\dots$

$z_{n-1}=\cos\frac{2(n-1)\pi}{n}+i\sin\frac{2(n-1)\pi}{n}$

n$z_n=\cos\frac{2n\pi}{n}+i\sin\frac{2n\pi}{n}=z_0$

 $z_1=\varepsilon$.



$$z_2=\varepsilon^2,\cdots,z_{n-1}=\varepsilon^{n-1},z_0=\varepsilon^0=1$$

 $n=11$ $n$

 $z^n-1=0$  $n$  $\varepsilon^0$$\varepsilon$$\varepsilon^2$$\cdots$$\varepsilon^{n-1}$.

$z^n-1=0$

```yaml
# "#"
# Hexo Configuration
## Docs: https://hexo.io/docs/configuration.html
## Source: https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/

# Site
title: Hexo # 
subtitle: # 
description: # 
keywords: # 
author: John Doe # 
language: # 
timezone: # 

# URL
## If your site is put in a subdirectory, set url as 'http://yoursite.com/child' and root as '/child/'
url: http://yoursite.com # 
root: / # 
permalink: :year/:month/:day/:title/ # 
permalink_defaults:

# Directory
# 
source_dir: source # 
public_dir: public # 
tag_dir: tags # 
archive_dir: archives # 
category_dir: categories # 
code_dir: downloads/code # (?)
i18n_dir: :lang
skip_render: # 

# Writing
# 
new_post_name: :title.md # 
default_layout: post # 
titlecase: false # ()
external_link: true # 
filename_case: 0 # 
render_drafts: false
post_asset_folder: false
relative_link: false
future: true
highlight: # 
  enable: true #
  line_number: true # 
  auto_detect: false # 
  tab_replace: # Tab
  
# 
# path: Root path for your blogs index page. (default = '')
# per_page: Posts displayed per page. (0 = disable pagination)
# order_by: Posts order. (Order by date descending by default)
index_generator:
  path: '' # 
  per_page: 10 # 
  order_by: -date # 
  
# Category & Tag
default_category: uncategorized # 
category_map:
tag_map:

# /
## HexoMoment.js
## 
## http://momentjs.com/docs/#/displaying/format/
date_format: YYYY-MM-DD # 
time_format: HH:mm:ss # 

# 
## per_page0
per_page: 10 # 
pagination_dir: page

# 
## : https://hexo.io/plugins/
## : https://hexo.io/themes/
theme: landscape # landscape

# 
## : https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html
deploy:
  type: git
  repository: git@github.com:waterdrop100/waterdrop100.github.io.git
  branch: master
```

{% cq %}  $e^{i\pi}+1=0$

 5  {% endcq %}

. 

<!-- more -->

---

## 



 - $z = a + b\cdot i$
 - $z = r(\cos\theta+i\sin\theta)$
 - $z = r\cdot e^{i\theta}$

 $z$ 

$$e^{i\theta}=\cos\theta+i\sin\theta$$

**** $\theta=\pi$****

$$e^{i\pi}+1=0$$

. 

---

## 

$z=\cos x+i\sin x$

$\frac{\mathrm{d}z}{\mathrm{d}x}=i\cos x-\sin x=i\cdot z$

$\frac{\mathrm{d}z}{z}=i\cdot\mathrm{d}x$

$\int\frac{\mathrm{d}z}{z}=i\int\mathrm{d}x$

$\ln z=ix+\mathrm{C}$ $\mathrm{C}$ 

 $\mathrm{C}$.

 $x=0$ $z=\cos0+i\sin0=1$

$\ln1=i\cdot0+\mathrm{C}$

 $\mathrm{C}=0$$\ln z=ix$

 $e^{\ln z}=e^{ix}$ $e^{\ln z}=z=\cos x+i\sin x$



$$e^{ix}=\cos x+i\sin x$$

 $x=\pi$ $e^{i\pi}+1=0$.

.

---

```cpp
int Read()
{
    #define cg ch = getchar()
    int x = 0, f = 1;
    char cg;
    while (ch < '0' || ch > '9')
    {
        if (ch == '-')
            f = -1; //
        cg;
    }
    while (ch >= '0' && ch <= '9')
    {
        x = (x << 1) + (x << 3) + (ch ^ 48); //x = x * 10 + ch - '0'
        cg;
    }
    return x * f; //
}
```

---
## 



```cpp
x = (x << 1) + (x << 3) + (ch ^ 48);
```

`x << 1`$x\times2$`x << 3`$x\times2^3=x\times8$$2x+8x=10x$`ch ^ 48``ch - '0'`. 

---
## 

 ~~~~ 

```cpp
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    freopen("input.txt", "w+", stdout);
    for (int i = 1; i <= 1000000; i++)    cout << "12345 ";
    for (int i = 1; i <= 1000000; i++)    cout << "12345 ";
    for (int i = 1; i <= 1000000; i++)    cout << "12345 ";
    return 0;
}
```

`cin``scanf()``Read()`

```cpp
#include<ctime>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

clock_t s, e;
int a;

inline int Read()
{
    int x = 0, f = 1;
    char ch = getchar();
    while (ch < '0' || ch > '9')
    {
        if (ch == '-')
            f = -1;
        ch = getchar();
    }
    while (ch >= '0' && ch <= '9')
    {
        x = (x << 1) + (x << 3) + (ch ^ 48);
        ch = getchar();
    }
    return x * f;
}

int main()
{
    //input.txt
    freopen("input.txt", "r+", stdin);

    //cin part
    cout << "cin takes ";
    s = clock();
    for (int i = 1; i <= 1000000; i++)    cin >> a;
    e = clock();
    cout << (double)(e - s) << endl;

    //scanf() part
    cout << "scanf() takes ";
    s = clock();
    for (int i = 1; i <= 1000000; i++)    scanf("%d", &a);
    e = clock();
    cout << (double)(e - s) << endl;

    //Read() part
    cout << "Read() takes ";
    s = clock();
    for (int i = 1; i <= 1000000; i++)    a = Read();
    e = clock();
    cout << (double)(e - s) << endl;

    return 0;
}
```



```cpp
cin takes 1984
scanf() takes 2507
Read() takes 191
```

{% cq %} (Fibonacci sequence)
1, 1, 2, 3, 5, 8, 13, 25, 38...
 {% endcq %}

 $\{a_n\}$ 

$$\left\{\begin{align*}
& a_n = a_{n-1}+a_{n-2} \\\\
& a_1 = a_2=1
\end{align*}\right.$$

.

<!-- more -->

---

## 

 $x$$y$ 

$$a_n-xa_{n-1}=y\cdot (a_{n-1}-xa_{n-2})$$

$$a_n=(x+y)a_{n-1}-xy\cdot a_{n-2}$$

$$a_n = a_{n-1}+a_{n-2}$$



$$\left\{\begin{align*}
& x+y = 1 \\\\
& -xy = 1
\end{align*}\right.$$

 $x$$y$ 

$$x^2-x-1=0$$

 $x,y=\frac{1\pm\sqrt{5}}{2}$

 $x$$y$ 

$$\left\{\begin{align*}
& \space a_n-xa_{n-1}=(a_2-xa_1)\cdot y^{n-2}=y^{n-1} \\\\
& \space a_n-ya_{n-1}=(a_2-ya_1)\cdot x^{n-2}=x^{n-1}
\end{align*}\right.$$

$-$ $(x-y)\cdot a_{n-1}=x^{n-1}-y^{n-1}$

$\Rightarrow a_{n-1}=\frac{x^{n-1}-y^{n-1}}{x-y}$

$\Rightarrow a_n=\frac{x^n-y^n}{x-y}$

 $x$$y$  $x,y=\frac{1\pm\sqrt{5}}{2}$

$$a_n=\frac{(\frac{1+\sqrt{5}}{2})^n-(\frac{1-\sqrt{5}}{2})^n}{\sqrt{5}}$$

 $a_n$ . $n$ .

---

## 

1.618.



$$\lim_{n\rightarrow+\infty}\frac{a_{n+1}}{a_n}=\frac{\sqrt{5}+1}{2}$$

.

 $x$$y$ 

$$a_n=\frac{x^n-y^n}{x-y}$$

 $x$$y$ 

$$\left\{\begin{align*}
& x=\frac{1+\sqrt{5}}{2} \\\\
& y=\frac{1-\sqrt{5}}{2}
\end{align*}\right.$$



$$\begin{align*}
\frac{a_{n+1}}{a_n} &= \frac{\frac{x^{n+1}-y^{n+1}}{x-y}}{\frac{x^n-y^n}{x-y}} \\\\
&= \frac{x^{n+1}-y^{n+1}}{x^n-y^n} \\\\
&= \frac{x\cdot x^n-x\cdot y^n-(y-x)\cdot y^n}{x^n-y^n} \\\\
&= x+(x-y)\cdot\frac{y^n}{x^n-y^n} \\\\
&= x+(x-y)\cdot\frac{1}{(\frac{x}{y})^n-1}
\end{align*}$$

 $\frac{x}{y}>1$

 $n\rightarrow+\infty$ $(\frac{x}{y})^n-1\rightarrow+\infty$



$$\lim_{n\rightarrow+\infty}\frac{a_{n+1}}{a_n}=\lim_{n\rightarrow+\infty}[x+(x-y)\cdot\frac{1}{(\frac{x}{y})^n-1}]=x=\frac{1+\sqrt{5}}{2}$$

.

\pi&=\lim_{n\rightarrow\infty}3\times2^n\cdot\sin\frac{\alpha}{2^n}\\
&=\lim_{n\rightarrow\infty}3\times2^{n-1}\cdot2\sin\frac{\alpha}{2^n}\\
&=\lim_{n\rightarrow\infty}3\times2^{n-1}\cdot\sqrt{2-a_{n-1}}\\
&=\lim_{n\rightarrow\infty}3\times2^n\cdot\sqrt{2-a_n}
\end{align*}$$

 $a_n$ 

$$\pi=\lim_{n\rightarrow\infty}3\times2^n\cdot\underbrace{\sqrt{2-\sqrt{2+\cdots+\sqrt{2+\sqrt{3}}}}}_{ n  2}$$

## 

>  $\forall$  $z$
>

![](/assets/Question2-pic1.svg)

 $H$  $AB$ $z$  $\overrightarrow{OB}$ .

 $|z-1|$  $z$  $1+0i$  $|AB|$

$$|z-1|=|AB|$$



$$|z-1|=|AB|=2|AH|=2|OA|\sin\frac{\theta}{2}=2\sin\frac{\theta}{2}$$

 $\theta$  $z$ .



$$\boxed{|z-1|=2\sin\frac{\theta}{2}}$$

---

## 

>  $\varepsilon^0,\varepsilon^1\cdots,\varepsilon^{n-1}$  $x^n-1=0$  $n$ 
> $$\boxed{\sum_{k=0}^{n-1}x^k=\prod_{k=1}^{n-1}(x-\varepsilon^k)}$$

 $\varepsilon^k$  $x^n-1=0$ 

{% linkcard "https://blog.xecades.xyz/articles/AcademicSubject/" "" %}



$$x^n-1=(x-1)(1+x+\cdots+x^{n-2}+x^{n-1})\tag{1}$$



$$x^n-1=(x-1)(x-\varepsilon^1)\cdots(x-\varepsilon^{n-2})(x-\varepsilon^{n-1})\tag{2}$$

 $x=1$  $1+x+\cdots+x^{n-2}+x^{n-1}=0$  $(1)$  $(2)$ 

$$1+x+\cdots+x^{n-2}+x^{n-1}=(x-\varepsilon^1)\cdots(x-\varepsilon^{n-2})(x-\varepsilon^{n-1})$$



$$\boxed{\sum_{k=0}^{n-1}x^k=\prod_{k=1}^{n-1}(x-\varepsilon^k)}$$

---

## 

>  $\forall n\in N^*$
> $$\boxed{\prod_{x=1}^{n-1}\sin\frac{x\pi}{n}=\frac{n}{2^{n-1}}}$$

.

 $x=1$

$$(1-\varepsilon^1)\cdots(1-\varepsilon^{n-2})(1-\varepsilon^{n-1})=n$$

 $1-\varepsilon^k$$k=1..n-1$  $0$

$$|1-\varepsilon^1|\cdots|1-\varepsilon^{n-2}|\cdot|1-\varepsilon^{n-1}|=n\tag{3}$$



$$\prod_{k=1}^{n-1}2\sin\frac{k\pi}{n}=n$$



$$\boxed{\prod_{x=1}^{n-1}\sin\frac{x\pi}{n}=\frac{n}{2^{n-1}}}$$

$$\forall n (n\in \mathbb{N}^*), \frac{\mathrm{d}^nf}{\mathrm{d}x^n}(x_0)=\frac{\mathrm{d}^nP}{\mathrm{d}x^n}(x_0)$$

---

## 

 $P(x)$ 

$$P(x) = c_0 + c_1x + c_2x^2 + c_3x^3 + \cdots$$

 $x_0=0$

### (n = 0)

 $x=x_0=0$  $0 = c_0$ $c_0$  0.

### n = 1

$$\frac{\mathrm{d}f}{\mathrm{d}x}(x) = (\sin x)' = \cos x$$

 $x=x_0=0$ 

$$\frac{\mathrm{d}f}{\mathrm{d}x}(x_0)=\cos0=1$$

 $P(x)$  $c_1+2c_2x+3c_3x^2+\cdots$. 

 $x=0$ $\frac{\mathrm{d}P}{\mathrm{d}x}(0)=c_1$

 $\frac{\mathrm{d}f}{\mathrm{d}x}(0)=\frac{\mathrm{d}P}{\mathrm{d}x}(0)$ $c_1=1$

---

### n = 2

$$\frac{\mathrm{d}^2f}{\mathrm{d}x^2}(x) = (\sin x)'' = (\cos x)' = -\sin x$$

$$\frac{\mathrm{d}^2f}{\mathrm{d}x^2}(0) = -\sin 0 = 0$$

$$\frac{\mathrm{d}^2P}{\mathrm{d}x^2}(x) = 1\times 2\cdot c_2+2\times3\cdot c_3x+3\times4\cdot c_4x^2+\cdots$$

$$\frac{\mathrm{d}^2P}{\mathrm{d}x^2}(0) = 2c_2$$

$$\frac{\mathrm{d}^2f}{\mathrm{d}x^2}(0) = \frac{\mathrm{d}^2P}{\mathrm{d}x^2}(0)$$

$$\Rightarrow c_2=0$$

---

### n = 3

$$\frac{\mathrm{d}^3f}{\mathrm{d}x^3}(x) = -\cos x$$

$$\frac{\mathrm{d}^3P}{\mathrm{d}x^3}(x) = 1\times2\times3\cdot c_3+2\times3\times4\cdot c_4x+3\times4\times5\times\cdot c_5x^2+\cdots$$

$$\frac{\mathrm{d}^3f}{\mathrm{d}x^3}(0) = \frac{\mathrm{d}^3P}{\mathrm{d}x^3}(0)$$

$$\Rightarrow -\cos0 = 1\times2\times3\cdot c_3$$

$$\Rightarrow c_3=-\frac{1}{6}$$

---

### n = 4

$$\frac{\mathrm{d}^4f}{\mathrm{d}x^4}(x) = \sin x$$

$$\frac{\mathrm{d}^4P}{\mathrm{d}x^4}(x) = 4!\cdot c_4+\frac{5!}{1!}\cdot c_5x+\frac{6!}{2!}\cdot c_6x^2+\cdots$$

$$\frac{\mathrm{d}^4f}{\mathrm{d}x^4}(0) = \frac{\mathrm{d}^4P}{\mathrm{d}x^4}(0)$$

$$\Rightarrow \sin0 = 4!\cdot c_4$$

$$\Rightarrow c_4=0$$

---

### n = 5



$$(\sin x)' = \cos x, \cos0=1$$

$$(\cos x)' = -\sin x, -\sin0=0$$

$$(-\sin x)' = -\cos x, -\cos0=-1$$

$$(-\cos x)' = \sin x, \sin0=0$$

 $f(x)$  $\cos x$

$P(x)$  $x=0$  $5!\cdot c_5$

$$\cos 0 = 5!\cdot c_5$$

$$\Rightarrow c_5 = \frac{1}{5!}$$

---

###

$$c_7 = \frac{-1}{7!} = -\frac{1}{7!}$$

 r $r = x\tan\theta$.

 P  $\sqrt{x^2+r^2}$ P 

$$\frac{k\sigma}{x^2+r^2}$$

 l . 



$$\frac{k\sigma}{x^2+r^2}\cdot\cos\theta=\frac{k\sigma}{x^2+r^2}\cdot\frac{x}{\sqrt{x^2+r^2}}$$

 P 

$$E_r=\frac{k\sigma}{x^2+r^2}\cdot\frac{x}{\sqrt{x^2+r^2}}\cdot2\pi r$$



$$E=\int_0^RE_r\mathrm dr=\int_0^R\frac{k\sigma}{x^2+r^2}\cdot\frac{x}{\sqrt{x^2+r^2}}\cdot2\pi r\mathrm dr$$



$$E=k\sigma\cdot2\pi x\cdot\int_0^Rr\cdot(x^2+r^2)^{-\frac{3}{2}}\mathrm dr$$



$$[-(x^2+r^2)^{-\frac{1}{2}}]'=r\cdot(x^2+r^2)^{-\frac{3}{2}}$$

 - 

$$E=k\sigma\cdot2\pi x\cdot[-(x^2+R^2)^{-\frac{1}{2}}+(x^2+0^2)^{-\frac{1}{2}}]=k\sigma\cdot2\pi\cdot(1-\frac{x}{\sqrt{x^2+R^2}})$$

```cpp
#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <algorithm>
#include <ctime>
using namespace std;

#define MAXN 10000

int n = 10;
int A[MAXN];
int B[MAXN];

bool check();
void apply();

int main()
{
	for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
		A[i] = B[i] = i;
	srand(time(0));
	random_shuffle(B + 1, B + n + 1);

	cout << "B = ";
	for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
		cout << B[i] << " ";
	cout << endl << endl;

	for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
		cout << i << " " << B[i] << endl;
	cout << endl << endl;

	for (int test = 1;; test++)
	{
		apply();
		cout << "<" << test << "> ";
		for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
			cout << A[i] << " ";
		cout << endl;
		if (check())
			getchar();
	}
	return 0;
}

void apply()
{
	int tA[MAXN] = {0};
	for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
		tA[B[i]] = A[i];
	for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
		A[i] = tA[i];
}

bool check()
{
	for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
		if (A[i] != i)
			return false;
	return true;
}
```

<!-- more -->

```cpp
#include <iostream>
#include <cstring>
#include <cstdio>
#include <vector>
using namespace std;

vector<int> a, b, lenx, leny;
int n, x, y, set = 0;

void cover(int);

int main()
{
    cin >> n;
    int tmp;
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
    {
        cin >> tmp;   a.push_back(tmp);
        cin >> tmp;   b.push_back(tmp);
        cin >> tmp;   lenx.push_back(tmp);
        cin >> tmp;   leny.push_back(tmp);
    }
    cin >> x >> y;
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
        cover(i);

    if (set == 0) cout << -1;
    else          cout << set;

    return 0;
}
void cover(int k)
{
    int i = x - a[k], j = y - b[k];
    if (i >= 0 && i <= lenx[k] && j >= 0 && j <= leny[k])
        set = k + 1;
}
```

`count`

<!-- more -->

```cpp
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<string>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;

string word;
int maxn = -1, minn = 101;

void GetMaxMin(string);
bool prime(int);

int main()
{
    cin >> word;
    GetMaxMin(word);
    if (prime(maxn - minn))
        cout << "Lucky Word" << endl << maxn - minn;
    else
        cout << "No Answer" << endl << 0;
    return 0;
}
void GetMaxMin(string s)
{
    for (char c = 'a'; c <= 'z'; c++)
    {
        int t = count(&s[0], &s[s.length()], c);
        maxn = max(t, maxn);
        if (t != 0)
            minn = min(t, minn);
    }
}
bool prime(int x)
{
    if (x < 2)
        return false;
    for (int i = 2; i * i <= x; i++)
        if (x % i == 0)
            return false;
    return true;
}
```

```
boy bo oy b o y
girl gir irl gi ir rl g i r l
```

`b o y g i r l``a z`

<!-- more -->

```cpp
#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <cstring>
#include <string>
using namespace std;

char str[260];

void init();
void replace_boy(char*, int);
void replace_girl(char*, int);

int main()
{
    cin >> str;
    init();
    int boy = 0, girl = 0;
    for (int i = 0, len = strlen(str); i < len; i++)
    {
        if (str[i] == 'a' || str[i] == 'b' || str[i] == 'o' || str[i] == 'y')
            boy++;
        else if (str[i] == 'z' || str[i] == 'g' || str[i] == 'i' || str[i] == 'r' || str[i] == 'l')
            girl++;
    }
    cout << boy << endl << girl;
    cin.get(); cin.get();
    return 0;
}
void init()
{
    //
    replace_boy("boy", 3);
    replace_boy("bo", 2);
    replace_boy("oy", 2);

    replace_girl("girl", 4);
    replace_girl("gir", 3);
    replace_girl("irl", 3);
    replace_girl("gi", 2);
    replace_girl("ir", 2);
    replace_girl("rl", 2);

}
void replace_boy(char* sub, int len)
{
    char *boy = strstr(str, sub);
    //str1str2
    while (boy != NULL)
    {
        *boy = 'a';
        for (int i = 1; i < len; i++)
            *(boy + i) = '.';
        boy = strstr(str, sub);//
    }
}
void replace_girl(char* sub, int len)
{
    char *girl = strstr(str, sub);
    while (girl != NULL)
    {
        *girl = 'z';
        for (int i = 1; i < len; i++)
            *(girl + i) = '.';
        girl = strstr(str, sub);
    }
}
```

```cpp
#include <iostream>
#include <cstring>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <cstdio>
using namespace std;

int n, m, edgenum, ans = 0;
bool dis[1010][1010] = {false}; //d
bool vis[1010] = {true};        //used
int seat[1010] = {0};           //

bool sit(int);

int main()
{
    cin >> n >> m >> edgenum;
    for (int i = 1; i <= edgenum; i++)
    {
        int u, v;
        cin >> u >> v;
        if (u > n || v > m) //
            continue;
        dis[u][v] = true;
    }
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
    {
        memset(vis, true, sizeof(vis));
        if (sit(i))
            ans++;
    }
    cout << ans;
    return 0;
}
bool sit(int a)
{
    if (a == 0)
        return true;
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
    {
        if (dis[i][a] && vis[i])
        {
            int t = seat[i];
            seat[i] = a;
            vis[i] = false;
            if (sit(t))
                return true;
            seat[i] = t;
        }
    }
    return false;
}
```

## Base64 

. 

[](https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/Base64)

Base64  ASCII  (8 ) (6)

 `=` . 

---

### 

![](/assets/base64-pic1.png)

 ( `Man` )

![](/assets/base64-pic2.png)

---

### 

 3  1  2 

 0  3  Base64 . 

 Base64  `=` . 

 ()  (2  byte)  6  Base64  0 

 ()  (1  byte)  6  Base64  0 . 

![](/assets/base64-pic3.png)

---

## 

```cpp
#include <iostream>
#include <string>
#include <cstring>
#include <windows.h>
using namespace std;

const int B_SIZE = 2000000;

struct trie // Trie 
{
	int nex[B_SIZE][26], cnt;
	bool exist[B_SIZE];

	void insert(string s)
	{
		int p = 0;
		int l = s.length();
		for (int i = 0; i < l; i++)
		{
			int c = s[i] - 'a';
			if (!nex[p][c])
				nex[p][c] = ++cnt;
			p = nex[p][c];
		}
		exist[p] = 1;
	}
	bool find(string s)
	{
		int p = 0;
		int l = s.length();
		for (int i = 0; i < l; i++)
		{
			int c = s[i] - 'a';
			if (!nex[p][c])
				return 0;
			p = nex[p][c];
		}
		return exist[p];
	}
} tree;

string purify(string); // 
string encode(string); // Base64 

string words[B_SIZE];
char title[500];
int cnt = 0, found = 0;

int main()
{
	freopen("Database.txt", "r", stdin);  // 
	freopen("Selected.txt", "w", stdout); // 
	while (cin >> words[cnt])
	{
		tree.insert(words[cnt]);
		cnt++;
	}
	cout << "Total: " << cnt << endl;
	for (int i = 0; i < cnt; i++)
	{
		string encoded = encode(words[i]); // 
		string pure = purify(encoded);

		sprintf(title, "%d %s -> %s", i, words[i].c_str(), encoded.c_str());
		SetConsoleTitle(title); // 

		if (tree.find(pure))
		{
			int len1 = words[i].length();
			int len2 = encoded.length();
			cout << words[i];
			for (int j = 1; j <= 10 - len1; j++) putchar(' '); // 
			cout << encoded;
			for (int j = 1; j <= 15 - len2; j++) putchar(' '); // 
			cout << "(" << pure << ")" << endl;
			found++;
		}
	}
	cout << "Done..." << endl << found << " Words Found!";
	return 0;
}

string purify(string str)
{
	string ans = "";
	for (int i = 0, len = str.length(); i < len; i++)
	{
		str[i] = tolower(str[i]);
		if ('a' <= str[i] && str[i] <= 'z')
			ans += str[i];
	}
	return ans;
}

string encode(string str) //  Base64 
{
	int len = str.length();
	int i;

	for (i = 0; i < len; i++)
		if (str[i] < 0 || str[i] > 127)
			throw "can not encode Non-ASCII characters";

	string enkey = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789+/";
	string ans(len * 4 / 3 + 4, '\0');

	int nLoop = (len % 3 == 0) ? len : len - 3;
	int n = 0;

	for (i = 0; i < nLoop; i += 3 )
	{
		ans[n] = enkey[str[i] >> 2];
		ans[n + 1] = enkey[((str[i] & 3) << 4) | ((str[i + 1] & 0xF0) >> 4)];
		ans[n + 2] = enkey[((str[i + 1] & 0x0f) << 2) | ((str[i + 2] & 0xc0 ) >> 6)];
		ans[n + 3] = enkey[str[i + 2] & 0x3F];
		n += 4;
	}

	switch (len % 3)
	{
	case 0:
		ans[n] = '\0';
		break;
	case 1:
		ans[n] = enkey[str[i] >> 2];
		ans[n + 1] = enkey[((str[i] & 3) << 4) | ((0 & 0xf0) >> 4)];
		ans[n + 2] = '=';
		ans[n + 3] = '=';
		ans[n + 4] = '\0';
		break;
	case 2:
		ans[n] = enkey[str[i] >> 2];
		ans[n + 1] = enkey[((str[i] & 3) << 4) | ((str[i + 1] & 0xf0) >> 4)];
		ans[n + 2] = enkey[(( str[i + 1] & 0xf) << 2 ) | ((0 & 0xc0) >> 6)];
		ans[n + 3] = '=';
		ans[n + 4] = '\0';
		break;
	}
	return ans;
}
```

```cpp
#include <iostream>
#include <string>
#include <cstring>
#include <windows.h>
using namespace std;

const int B_SIZE = 2000000;

struct trie // Trie 
{
	int nex[B_SIZE][26], cnt;
	bool exist[B_SIZE];

	void insert(string s)
	{
		int p = 0;
		int l = s.length();
		for (int i = 0; i < l; i++)
		{
			int c = s[i] - 'a';
			if (!nex[p][c])
				nex[p][c] = ++cnt;
			p = nex[p][c];
		}
		exist[p] = 1;
	}
	bool find(string s)
	{
		int p = 0;
		int l = s.length();
		for (int i = 0; i < l; i++)
		{
			int c = s[i] - 'a';
			if (!nex[p][c])
				return 0;
			p = nex[p][c];
		}
		return exist[p];
	}
} tree;

string purify(string); // 
string encode(string); // Base64 

string words[B_SIZE];
char title[500];
int cnt = 0, found = 0;

int main()
{
	freopen("Database.txt", "r", stdin);  // 
	freopen("Selected.txt", "w", stdout); // 
	while (cin >> words[cnt])
	{
		tree.insert(words[cnt]);
		cnt++;
	}
	cout << "Total: " << cnt << endl;
	for (int i = 0; i < cnt; i++)
	{
		string encoded = encode(words[i]); // 
		string pure = purify(encoded);

		sprintf(title, "%d %s -> %s", i, words[i].c_str(), encoded.c_str());
		SetConsoleTitle(title); // 

		if (tree.find(pure))
		{
			int len1 = words[i].length();
			int len2 = encoded.length();
			cout << words[i];
			for (int j = 1; j <= 10 - len1; j++) putchar(' '); // 
			cout << encoded;
			for (int j = 1; j <= 15 - len2; j++) putchar(' '); // 
			cout << "(" << pure << ")" << endl;
			found++;
		}
	}
	cout << "Done..." << endl << found << " Words Found!";
	return 0;
}

string purify(string str)
{
	string ans = "";
	for (int i = 0, len = str.length(); i < len; i++)
	{
		str[i] = tolower(str[i]);
		if ('a' <= str[i] && str[i] <= 'z')
			ans += str[i];
	}
	return ans;
}

string encode(string str) //  Base64 
{
	int len = str.length();
	int i;

	for (i = 0; i < len; i++)
		if (str[i] < 0 || str[i] > 127)
			throw "can not encode Non-ASCII characters";

	string enkey = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789+/";
	string ans(len * 4 / 3 + 4, '\0');

	int nLoop = (len % 3 == 0) ? len : len - 3;
	int n = 0;

	for (i = 0; i < nLoop; i += 3 )
	{
		ans[n] = enkey[str[i] >> 2];
		ans[n + 1] = enkey[((str[i] & 3) << 4) | ((str[i + 1] & 0xF0) >> 4)];
		ans[n + 2] = enkey[((str[i + 1] & 0x0f) << 2) | ((str[i + 2] & 0xc0 ) >> 6)];
		ans[n + 3] = enkey[str[i + 2] & 0x3F];
		n += 4;
	}

	switch (len % 3)
	{
	case 0:
		ans[n] = '\0';
		break;
	case 1:
		ans[n] = enkey[str[i] >> 2];
		ans[n + 1] = enkey[((str[i] & 3) << 4) | ((0 & 0xf0) >> 4)];
		ans[n + 2] = '=';
		ans[n + 3] = '=';
		ans[n + 4] = '\0';
		break;
	case 2:
		ans[n] = enkey[str[i] >> 2];
		ans[n + 1] = enkey[((str[i] & 3) << 4) | ((str[i + 1] & 0xf0) >> 4)];
		ans[n + 2] = enkey[(( str[i + 1] & 0xf) << 2 ) | ((0 & 0xc0) >> 6)];
		ans[n + 3] = '=';
		ans[n + 4] = '\0';
		break;
	}
	return ans;
}
```

$$S_n=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{4}a^2[1+\sum_{i=1}^{n-1}\frac{3}{4}\cdot(\frac{4}{9})^i]$$



$$\lim_{n\rightarrow+\infty}S_n=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{4}a^2[1+\sum_{i=1}^{n-1}\frac{3}{4}\cdot(\frac{4}{9})^i]$$

$$=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{4}a^2[1+\frac{3}{4}\cdot\frac{\frac{4}{9}(1-(\frac{4}{9})^{n-1})}{1-\frac{4}{9}}]$$

$$=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{4}a^2[1+\frac{3}{4}\cdot\frac{\frac{4}{9}(1-0)}{1-\frac{4}{9}}]$$

$$=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{4}a^2\cdot\frac{8}{5}$$

$$=\frac{2}{5}\sqrt{3}a^2$$

 a 

$$S=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{4}a^2$$

 N  4 N . 

 $\frac{1}{3}$

 n 

$$S_n=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{4}a^2[1+\sum_{i=1}^{n-1}\frac{3}{4}\cdot(\frac{4}{9})^i]$$



$$\lim_{n\rightarrow+\infty}S_n=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{4}a^2[1+\sum_{i=1}^{n-1}\frac{3}{4}\cdot(\frac{4}{9})^i]$$

$$=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{4}a^2[1+\frac{3}{4}\cdot\frac{\frac{4}{9}(1-(\frac{4}{9})^{n-1})}{1-\frac{4}{9}}]$$

$$=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{4}a^2[1+\frac{3}{4}\cdot\frac{\frac{4}{9}(1-0)}{1-\frac{4}{9}}]$$

$$=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{4}a^2\cdot\frac{8}{5}$$

$$=\frac{2}{5}\sqrt{3}a^2$$

 $\frac{2}{5}\sqrt{3}a^2$
